colourTooltip: Ka tīnihia te kara o te pene rākau.
createSnowflakeSquare: hangaia he whā hukarere ma te ahua tapawhā
createSnowflakeParallelogram: create a snowflake of type parallelogram
createSnowflakeLine: hangaia he whā hukarere ma te ahua rarangi
createSnowflakeSpiral: hangaia he whā hukarere ma te ahua tōrino
createSnowflakeFlower: hangaia he whā hukarere ma te ahua putiputi
createSnowflakeFractal: create a snowflake of type fractal
createSnowflakeRandom: hangaia he whā hukarere ma te ahua noa
jumpTooltip: Moves the artist without leaving any marks.
jumpEastTooltip: Moves the artist east without leaving any marks.
jumpNorthTooltip: Moves the artist north without leaving any marks.
jumpSouthTooltip: Moves the artist south without leaving any marks.
jumpWestTooltip: Moves the artist west without leaving any marks.
lengthFeedback: You got it right except for the lengths to move.
moveEastTooltip: Ka nekehia te ringatoi ki te rāwhiti.
moveForwardTooltip: Ka nekehia te ringatoi ki mua.
moveNorthTooltip: Ka nekehia te ringatoi ki te raki.
moveSouthTooltip: Ka nekehia te ringatoi ki te tonga.
moveWestTooltip: Ka nekehia te ringatoi ki te uru.
moveTooltip: Moves the artist forward or backward by the specified amount.
notBlackColour: You need to set a color other than black for this puzzle.
numBlocksNeeded: This puzzle can be solved with %1 blocks.  You used %2.
penTooltip: Lifts or lowers the pencil, to start or stop drawing.
reinfFeedbackMsg: Here is your drawing! Keep working on it or continue to the next puzzle.
tooFewColours: You need to use at least %1 different colors for this puzzle.  You used only %2.
turnRightTooltip: Turns the artist right by the specified angle.
turnTooltip: Turns the artist left or right by the specified number of degrees.
turtleVisibilityTooltip: Makes the artist visible or invisible.
widthTooltip: Changes the width of the pencil.
wrongColour: Your picture is the wrong color.  For this puzzle, it needs to be %1.
